attributes.action: get his email service up and running so he can respond to the electorate's queries and issues.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 10 Downing Street email service to Gordon Brown has now been out of service since the 23rd June.  That is over 10 days!  I don't know of any other organisation that takes more than a week to fix a problem with their email. In these troubled, Labour Govt induced, times; It appears to be more of a case of stick your head in the sand and turn your email off , rather than address the electorate's issues and concerns.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
